definitions.definition: Alpha Scorpii (α Sco), the brightest star in the constellation Scorpius . It is a M type red giant , and is a binary with a B type companion visible in greenish.

main_definition: Alpha Scorpii (α Sco), the brightest star in the constellation Scorpius . It is a M type red giant , and is a binary with a B type companion visible in greenish.
